Name: Onefold Taxi Simulator
About the game: Become a taxi driver and experience the everyday life in this profession. In the beginning, you are just an ordinary taxi driver. Your job is to transport people. Work as hard as possible to improve and in the end you can be the best in town. Once you have enough capital, you can hire workers and buy more cars to generate even more income. Hurry, but be careful with the weather and drive carefully. features: - Realistic graphics - Realistic driving - Realistic weather - Open world - Time limit mod - Company management
